request.user_idea: I want to build an mobile app that tells you the top played video at every age

brd_document.title: Top Age-Based Video Play Insights App
brd_document.executive_summary: This Business Requirements Document outlines the creation of a mobile application that offers users insights into the most played video at every age, providing a unique perspective on video content consumption across different demographics. The app aims to fill the gap in the market by leveraging data analytics to provide curated content recommendations based on age-specific interests, thereby enhancing user engagement and satisfaction. Through this initiative, we aim to capture a significant share of the digital content market by offering a novel service that appeals to users' curiosity and personal preferences.
brd_document.business_context: The digital content consumption landscape is rapidly evolving, with users increasingly seeking personalized and meaningful content. Current market offerings focus on general trends and popularity metrics, often overlooking the nuanced preferences of different age groups. This gap presents a unique opportunity to launch an innovative mobile application that tailors video recommendations based on the most played videos across various age demographics. By addressing this untapped need, the app stands to carve a niche in the competitive content discovery and recommendation market, offering insights that can enhance marketing strategies, content creation, and user engagement.
brd_document.problem_statement: There is a lack of personalized content discovery tools that cater to the specific interests of users based on their age, leading to a gap in the market for a service that can provide age-specific video content insights.

objectives.description: Develop and launch a mobile app that provides users with the top played video content for every age group, thereby enhancing personalized content discovery.
success_criteria: Achieve 100,000 downloads within the first six months
objectives.business_value: Fills a market gap by providing age-specific content insights, increasing user engagement and opening new marketing avenues.

in_scope: Development of mobile app for iOS and Android
Data analytics for identifying top played videos by age
User interface design focused on ease of use

constraints: Dependency on third-party data providers for video metrics
assumptions: Users are looking for more personalized content recommendations
Access to reliable data on video play metrics is available

risks.description: Potential inaccuracies in age-related video play data leading to irrelevant recommendations
risks.mitigation: Implement robust data validation and user feedback mechanisms

stakeholders.name: Project Manager
stakeholders.role: Oversees the project to ensure objectives are met on time and within budget.

success_metrics: Metric 1: Achieve 100,000 downloads within the first six months
Metric 2: Maintain a user engagement rate of 60% or higher

milestones.name: App Development and Testing
deliverables: Beta version of the app for internal testing

prd_document.product_vision: To become the go-to mobile application for discovering and reliving the most popular videos from one's youth, fostering a sense of nostalgia and connection across generations.
target_audience: Millennials seeking a nostalgic trip to their childhood and teenage years through popular culture
Gen Z looking to discover the viral video content from before their time
prd_document.value_proposition: AgeTune offers a unique journey through time, providing users with curated lists of top-played videos from any given age, connecting them with the past's viral moments.

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to select my birth year and see the top videos from each year of my life so that I can relive the nostalgia of those times.
acceptance_criteria: User can select a birth year
App displays a list of top videos for each year since the birth year

features.name: Yearly Video Timeline
features.description: A feature allowing users to view a timeline of top videos from their birth year to the current year.
acceptance_criteria: Timeline is accurately populated with top videos based on the user's birth year

technical_requirements.description: The app must be developed using a microservices architecture to ensure scalability and easy updates.
constraints: Must ensure microservices are loosely coupled

prd_document.architecture_overview: AgeTune will leverage a microservices architecture for its backend, hosted on AWS to ensure scalability and reliability. The front end will be developed with React for a responsive, app-like experience on web browsers.
dependencies: Spotify API for music video trending data
acceptance_criteria: App must load within 2 seconds on a standard 4G mobile connection
App must support at least 10,000 concurrent users without degradation of performance
metrics_and_kpis: KPI 1: Daily active users (DAU) target is 10,000 within the first 6 months
KPI 2: User retention rate should be at least 40% after 30 days
